screens.headline: Probability of Profit (POP)
screens.text: POP is the chance your trade ends with any profit at expiration. For condors, it's the probability the stock finishes between your breakevens.

cards.definition: Higher POP â†’ lower credit; lower POP â†’ higher credit.

screens.question: If an iron condor has ~70% POP, over 100 trades you expect roughly:
screens.explanation_correct: Right. POP approximates long-run win rate (with variance).
screens.explanation_wrong: POP is the expected win frequency across many trades.
